backend/main.mo: Defines data types for profiles, tasks, decisions, and overtime plus in-memory maps/lists and default dental avatar data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence with affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for overtime‑related updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme tokens and dark mode variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app with root div and main script import.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root handling Internet Identity auth flow and rendering login or authenticated content within theme and i18n providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Controls post-login role selection, profile onboarding, and main app shell with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty placeholder file for a manager confirmation dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen letting users pick assistant or manager role, optionally enter manager token, and trigger Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: UI for selecting assistant or manager role, handling token input and restoring pending choices from sessionStorage before submitting via role-selection hooks.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty module placeholder for avatar manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Fetches available dental avatars and displays a selectable grid with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG dental avatar by ID with validation and fallback logic for missing or invalid SVGs.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored circular SVG avatar displaying user initials.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between uploaded photo, dental avatar, or generated initials avatar based on provided props.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines static badge metadata including IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Slide-out shelf showing all badges with earned status styling and translations.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full-screen fallback component displaying error details and a retry button for failed queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, theme and language controls, profile menu, settings and badge access, and logout handling.
Main application layout with header, tab navigation, admin-only manager tab, routed page content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown for switching app language among predefined options.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user info, comments, and before/after photos. Filters completed tasks and maps profiles for display.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Builds a bar chart of task completions per user using Recharts. Aggregates completion counts from tasks and matches them with user profiles.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Renders a dropdown to select a user, showing avatars and usernames. Emits the selected Principal to the parent component.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Provides a horizontal tab navigation bar. Highlights the active tab and triggers tab change callbacks.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Offers a custom date input with synced native date picker, restricting selection to the past two months. Updates day, month, and year fields from user input or picker.
Form for creating overtime entries with validation, date limits, and add/deduct behavior. Submits minutes and date to backend and resets after success.
Shows a chronological list of overtime entries with color‑coded add/deduct indicators. Formats timestamps into human‑readable dates.
Computes and displays total signed overtime minutes and a formatted composite time. Uses memoization to derive totals from entries.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Panel for exporting cached user data and clearing local profile data. Supports logout-style deletion and includes confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for first‑time profile setup allowing username, initials, avatar selection, and optional photo upload with progress, then saving via API.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Reusable photo upload field with validation, preview, delete option, and upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile editing panel enabling updates to username, initials, avatar or photo, with upload, removal, and save logic tied to user profile APIs.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task with comment input and optional before/after photo attachments uploaded as blobs.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task with title, description, and type selection, submitting to the task creation API.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Card displaying task details, type badges, completion state, and actions to complete or reset the task with optional modal.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Renders a sorted list of tasks, placing completed tasks last and ordering by type priority before mapping them into TaskCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides queries to fetch the caller's user role and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges from overtime and task data and returns them alongside all available badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches and caches dental avatars from the backend and provides a lookup helper by avatar ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context, ensuring it is used within an I18nProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login/logout functions, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches overtime entries for a specific user and provides a helper to format entries for export.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Defines a disabled-by-default query to export all task data from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Wraps toast notifications and normalizes common backend error messages into user-friendly alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller overtime entries and create new entries with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific hooks are implemented elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Provides mutations for selecting assistant or manager roles and invalidates related role queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Includes hooks to fetch, create, complete, and reset tasks with optimistic updates and error recovery for weekly resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, save, upload photos for, and list user profiles with corresponding cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides i18n context with language state, persistence, and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation dictionaries for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode palette, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query, Internet Identity, and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Manager dashboard with tabs for overtime management and task statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Manager view to inspect users' overtime, select users, and export overtime CSV.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Manager page showing task charts, audit logs, and task data CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history after loading user overtime entries.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows task list, create dialog, and handles recurring task reset logic.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility to convert data arrays to CSV and trigger client‑side download.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeTime.ts: Provides overtime time constants and function to format minutes into days, hours, minutes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current ICP app state, including requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the FitGebit Team Tracker.
